categoryBlurb: Know someone who absolutely love cute things? We've picked out a few things that will be sure to make them happy!

productList.productDescription:
• Realistic looking plush

  • Cuddly and huggable

  • Stands on its own

  • Recommended Age Range 3 Years and up

productList.productName: Studio Ghibli My Neighbor Totoro 29" Jumbo Size Sleepy Totoro Plush Doll
productList.productDescription:
• Made by Sun Arrow the exclusive Totoro plush maker

  • Approved by Studio Ghibli

  • Length: 29 inches

  • Jumbo size sleepy Totoro plush doll

  • Imported from Japan

• Truly soft sculpture works of art

  • Crafted by artists for a unique and close to nature look

  • Hand-painted and airbrushed for subtle coloring

  • Each contains an exceptionally strong, lightweight, structural steel frame

  • Capable of being "ridden" by children and adults up to 150 lbs.

productList.productName: Very Big Smiling Teddy Bear Five Feet Tall Caramel Color with Bigfoot Paws Giant Stuffed Animal Bear
productList.productDescription:
• Guaranteed to make a BIG impression in size and quality. Stuffed with squishy soft polyester for lots of hugging and snuggling.

  • Great gift of love for guaranteed big smiles and happy memories. Ships in BIG Box for Maximum BIG Impression. Hard to find. Grab it now.

  • This super-sized version of the "classic" teddy bear is sure to be a great ambassador of your feelings. Go ahead and let him do the talking for you.

productList.productName: Gigantic Stuffed Easter Bunny 52 Inches Almost 5 Feet Wide Soft Giant Plush Rabbit Made in the USA
productList.productDescription:
• Extremely large stuffed plush bunny rabbit: 97,344 CUBIC INCHES Absolutely enormous attention-getter

  • Unique, soft and luxorious white fur. Ships in an ENORMOUS box that a person could fit inside of!

  • Purple color satin neck-ribbon is easily removable. Hard to find unique design is sure to impress - Made in the USA with pride and attention to detail

• Handmade

  • Capacity　4GB

  • Interface　USB2.0

  • Accessory　Food Sample(SUSHI "HUTOMAKI")
